fixes.name: Delta Down T MarketCCY FX
fixes.dax_expression:
SWITCH(
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[marketCCY],
    "AUD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_AUD],
    "CAD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CAD],
    "CHF", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CHF],
    "EUR", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_EUR],
    "GBP", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_GBP],
    "HKD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_HKD],
    "JPY", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_JPY],
    "MXN", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_MXN],
    "NZD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_NZD],
    "SEK", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_SEK],
    "SGD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_SGD],
    "USD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_USD],
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau CASE on [marketCCY] to a DAX SWITCH that returns the row-level product of [Delta Down T] and the corresponding FX rate column. Implemented as a calculated column because the expression uses only row-level fields (no aggregations or parameters).
